message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am interested in purchasing the product for $15,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I am still committed to finding the best value for my budget. I would like to counter your offer with $15,000.
